zhcn_desc: §L同一个声音，同一个权力，同一个国家。所有的民众，都有着庄严的义务去服从明智的少数人。而这些少数人承担了领导民众的巨大责任。§!\n
en_desc: §LA single voice, a single throne, a single state. It is the solemn duty of the masses to obey those enlightened few who have been charged with the great responsibility of leadership.§!\n
